column1: {\fontspec{Bookman Old Style} \fontsize{16}{19}\selectfont \bf Welcome}\\~\\On behalf of SWE and TBP we would like to welcome you to the 31st annual Fall Engineering Career Fair! At the fair this year we expect over 340 companies
column2: and over 3500 students in attendance. As the directors of the fair
column3: we are honored to organize an event that provides so many amazing opportunities for students in the College of Engineering. ~\\

column1: SWE and TBP organize hundreds of events throughout the year including professional development seminars
For more information about SWE and TBP
column2: feel free to visit our websites at swe.engin.umich.edu and tbp.engin.umich.edu

column1: \end{multicols}\newpage{\fontspec{Bookman Old Style} \fontsize{20}{24}\selectfont \bf Message from Corporate Sponsor\\Fidessa}\\~\\{\fontsize{12.000000}{14.400000}\selectfont Hey UMich Engineering students: \\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ We are Fidessa
column2: an innovative tech company with a passion for delivering high performance solutions to the finance industry. We're looking for driven
column4: and diverse engineering students like you to help us make an impact and create cutting edge applications used across the world. We know that the University of Michigan Engineering students are just that and that's why Fidessa is a proud sponsor of the 2015 SWE/TBP Engineering Career Fair!\\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ We are a dynamic global company with over 15 offices worldwide. With continued commitment from our employees and customers
column5: we offer unique access to the largest and most valuable trading community
column6: from global institutions and investment banks to boutique brokers and niche hedge funds. Our advanced products and services cover the whole trading lifecycle
column7: from low latency trading tools to settlement
column8: compliance and risk management.\\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ We are freethinking and do not believe in rigid structure or tight controls where these limit our ability to be innovative and adaptable. We recognize that a business is only as good as its people. To provide and build on our high-quality platform and services
column9: we seek to employ only the best!\\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ Do you think you have what it takes? If so
column10: stop by the Fidessa booth at the Engineering Career Fair to speak with a Fidessa representative and take our Coding challenge. \\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ We look forward to seeing you there! \\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ Learn more about Fidessa at \url{www.fidessa.com/careers} \\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ Sincerely
column11: \\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ Fidessa Recruitment Team \\[-0.250000ex]~}\begin{center}\begin{adjustbox}{max size={.5\textwidth}{2in}}\includegraphics[height=2in]{Fidessa_LOGO.eps}\end{adjustbox}\end{center}\newpage{\fontspec{Bookman Old Style} \fontsize{20}{24}\selectfont \bf Message from Corporate Sponsor\\UP}\\~\\{\fontsize{12.000000}{14.400000}\selectfont Dear University of Michigan Engineering Students:\\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ On behalf of our partnership with the Society of Women Engineers and Tau Beta Pi
column12: BP America is pleased to welcome you to the 2015 SWE/TBP Engineering Career Fair! \\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ FULL-TIME
column13: INTERNSHIP \& CO-OP OPPORTUNITIES FOR ENGINEERING RELATED MAJORS\\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ Here at BP
column14: you will have opportunities to develop in many areas. From becoming a world-class engineering specialist to pursuing a career in project management or operations; you will experience a journey of consistent growth and development. Full-time hires at BP will be a part of the Challenge program. This is a program that provides experience of the complete exploration process through a series of 18-24 month placements. You’ll discover the complex
column15: interrelated nature of energy as you work on real projects with real applications and real responsibilities. Everyone will go through a thorough training and development program where you’ll have a structured induction
column16: access to a buddy and mentor
column20: networking and planned development. With each role
column21: there is a distinct training program.\\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ At BP
column22: we are equally committed to our internship programs. As an intern or co-op you’ll work on real projects that deliver tangible benefits and measurable results. At the same time
column23: you’ll have the opportunity to learn about and help to solve some of the most important issues we face. You will experience genuine teamwork
column24: and work alongside highly qualified and experienced colleagues
column25: while you work on live projects and operations
column26: using the latest equipment and technology.\\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ Depending on your major and area of interest for your career
column27: individuals with engineering related majors may have the opportunity to work within one or more of the following segments in BP: Upstream
column29: and Alternative Energy.\\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ BP recruits majors for the following disciplines: Engineering
column30: Science and Business. Candidates with a minimum 3.2 GPA pursuing bachelor’s
column31: master’s and PhD degrees are encouraged to apply for roles of their interest. All applicants are required to apply online at www.bp.com\uscampus for interview consideration. \\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ We at BP stand for SAFETY
column34: COURAGE and ONE TEAM. Stop our booth our booth today to learn of more of the exciting opportunities that await you at BP. Join us! \\[-0.250000ex]~ \\[-0.250000ex]~ Sincerely
